seprhou.network

Class MultiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • seprhou.network.NetworkCommon<com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Server>
      • seprhou.network.MultiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, GameEndpoint

    public class MultiServer
extends NetworkCommon<com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Server>
    Class which implements the host side of the multiplayer game

    • Method Detail

      • getMyColour

        public AircraftColour getMyColour()
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Returns the colour used for aircraft controlled by this endpoint

      • actBegin

        public void actBegin()
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Method called at the start of the global act method

        You should call this method once per frame, before acting on anything in the airspace.

        This method will receive + process messages from the other endpoint

      • actEnd

        public void actEnd(float delta)
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Method called at the end of the global act method

        You should call this method once per frame, after acting on anything in the airspace.

        This method will refresh the airspace and send updates / requests to the other endpoint

        Parameters:
        delta - time since last frame (seconds)

      • takeOff

        public void takeOff()
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Ask one aircraft to take off

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

      • handover

        public void handover(Aircraft aircraft)
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Handover an aircraft to the other player

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

        Parameters:
        aircraft - aircraft to handover

      • setTargetVelocity

        public void setTargetVelocity(AirspaceObject object,
                     Vector2D velocity)
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Sets the target velocity of an aircraft

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

        Parameters:
        object - object to change
        velocity - new velocity

      • setTargetAltitude

        public void setTargetAltitude(AirspaceObject object,
                     float altitude)
        Description copied from interface: GameEndpoint
        Sets the target altitude of an aircraft

        The request may not take affect immediately (it may need a network roundtrip)

        Parameters:

        altitude - new altitude
